data.lyric:
[ti:Use This Gospel]
[ar:Kanye West/Clipse/Kenny G]
[al:JESUS IS KING]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Use This Gospel - Kanye West/Clipse/Kenny G
[00:28.35]Kanye West：
[00:31.39]Use this gospel for protection
[00:35.11]It's a hard road to Heaven
[00:38.60]We call on your blessings
[00:41.63]In the Father we put our faith
[00:45.28]King of the kingdom
[00:48.37]Our demons are tremblin'
[00:51.37]Holy angels defendin'
[00:54.55]In the Father we put our faith
[01:09.24]Pusha T：
[01:12.15]How could He not be the greatest
[01:14.35]In my bed under covers when undercovers had raided
[01:18.55]My presence is happy belated
[01:21.07]Fashionably late I'm just glad that you made it
[01:24.14]The best is yet to come
[01:25.44]I'm just glad that you waited
[01:27.33]They all say they real 'til it's time to appraise it
[01:30.61]I seen them come and go
[01:32.04]You only the latest
[01:33.79]But who am I to judge
[01:35.16]I'm crooked as Vegas
[01:36.04]Kanye West：
[01:36.42]Use this gospel for protection
[01:39.90]It's a hard road to Heaven
[01:43.47]We call on your blessings
[01:46.46]In the Father we put our faith
[01:50.14]King of the kingdom
[01:53.12]Our demons are tremblin'
[01:56.27]Holy angels defendin'
[01:59.40]In the Father we put our faith
[02:02.62]No Malice：
[02:03.92]A lot of damaged souls I done damaged those
[02:07.17]And in my arrogance took a camera pose
[02:10.39]Caught with a trunk of Barry Manilows
[02:13.51]They sing a different tune when the slammer close
[02:16.91]From the concrete grew a rose
[02:19.69]They give you Wraith talk I give you faith talk
[02:23.10]Blindfolded on this road watch me faith walk
[02:26.12]Just hold on to your brother when his faith lost
data.trans:
[ti:Use This Gospel]
[ar:Kanye West/Clipse/Kenny G]
[al:JESUS IS KING]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:28.35]//
[00:31.39]聆听福音 寻求庇护
[00:35.11]去天堂的路上艰难坎坷
[00:38.60]我们祈求着你的祝福
[00:41.63]我们所信仰的天父
[00:45.28]国之君主
[00:48.37]我们的心魔浑身战栗
[00:51.37]圣洁的天使保护我们
[00:54.55]我们所信仰的天父
[01:09.24]//
[01:12.15]他怎么不是最伟大的
[01:14.35]我窝在床上 卑鄙小人潜伏在我身边 时刻想加害我
[01:18.55]我的出现就是晚来的幸福
[01:21.07]姗姗来迟 你还是来了 我感到高兴
[01:24.14]最美好的日子尚未来临
[01:25.44]我只是很欣慰你还在等待
[01:27.33]他们都说自己保持初心 直到评价的时刻来临
[01:30.61]我看见人们来去匆匆
[01:32.04]你只是最新的一个
[01:33.79]可我有何资格去评判
[01:35.16]我像拉斯维加斯一样堕落
[01:36.04]//
[01:36.42]聆听福音 寻求庇护
[01:39.90]去天堂的路上艰难坎坷
[01:43.47]我们祈求着你的祝福
[01:46.46]我们所信仰的天父
[01:50.14]国之君主
[01:53.12]我们的心魔浑身战栗
[01:56.27]圣洁的天使保护我们
[01:59.40]我们所信仰的天父
[02:02.62]//
[02:03.92]数不胜数的受伤灵魂 我受够了伤害他们
[02:07.17]我态度傲慢 摆个拍照姿势
[02:10.39]抓住我带着一堆违禁品
[02:13.51]刑期逼近 他们唱出不同的曲调
[02:16.91]钢筋水泥里生长出一朵玫瑰
[02:19.69]他们和你的劳斯莱斯幻影聊天 我和你聊聊信仰
[02:23.10]在这条路上蒙上双眼 摒弃杂音 看我靠着信仰勇敢前行
[02:26.12]当你的手足失去信心 你要助他一臂之力
